001import java.awt.Graphics;
002import java.awt.Graphics2D;
003
004import java.lang.Math;
005/** Bullet.java - A bullet shot by the player\
006* This class features inheritence from custom class GamePiece per requirement a. in
007* project specification
008* @author Daniel Andrews
009* @version Final Project
010*/
011public class Bullet extends GamePiece {
012        private double x, // x and y coordinates
013                                   y,
014                                   direction, // Direction and maximum range to travel
015                                   range;
016
017        private int speed; // Speed to travel at
018        private boolean enabled = true; // Bullet state
019        private boolean isPlayerBullet;
020
021        public Bullet(double x, double y, double direction, int speed, boolean isPlayerBullet) {
022                this.x = x; // Set x, y, and direction
023                this.y = y;
024                this.direction = direction;
025                this.speed = speed;
026                this.isPlayerBullet = isPlayerBullet;
027                range = Asteroids.CANVAS_WIDTH * 2; // Bullet should be able to travel twice across the game canvas
028                setImage(Asteroids.gc.getBulletImage()); // Retrieve image from controller
029        }
030        
031        /** Wraps bullet around screen if it exceeds game window boundaries
032         * @return true if object is offscreen, false otherwise
033        */
034        public boolean screenWrap() {
035                if (x > Asteroids.CANVAS_WIDTH - getImage().getWidth() / 2) {
036                        x = 0 - getImage().getWidth() / 2;
037                        return true;
038                } // Right wrap
039                if (x < 0 - getImage().getWidth()) {
040                        x = Asteroids.CANVAS_WIDTH - getImage().getWidth();
041                        return true;
042                } // Left wrap
043                if (y > Asteroids.CANVAS_HEIGHT - getImage().getHeight() / 2) {
044                        y = 0 - getImage().getHeight() / 2;
045                        return true;
046                } // Bottom wrap
047                if (y < 0 - getImage().getHeight()) {
048                        y = Asteroids.CANVAS_HEIGHT - getImage().getHeight();
049                        return true;
050                } // Top wrap
051                return false; // False if object is on screen
052        }
053        
054        /** Update player each frame
055        */
056        public void tick() {
057                move(); // Move bullet
058                if (range <= 0.0) {
059                        this.destroy(); // If bullet has exhausted its range, destroy
060                }
061                if (screenWrap() && !isPlayerBullet) {
062                        destroy();
063                } // Wrap around screen and repaint each frame
064                repaint();
065        }
066
067        /** Paint the object on the graphics canvas
068        * @param g Graphics canvas to paint object on
069        */
070        public void paintComponent(Graphics g) {
071                super.paintComponent(g);
072                Graphics2D g2 = (Graphics2D) g; // Cast canvas to 2d canvas
073
074                g2.drawImage(getImage(), (int) x, (int) y, this); // Draw image at position
075        }
076
077        /** Move bullet based on direction and speed
078        */
079        public void move() {
080                x += Math.cos(Math.toRadians(direction)) * speed; // Calculate change in x and y based on direction of travel
081                y += Math.sin(Math.toRadians(direction)) * speed;
082                if (isPlayerBullet) {
083                        range -= speed; // Update remaining range
084                } else {
085                        range -= speed * 2;
086                }
087        }
088
089        /** Destroy bullet
090        */
091        public void destroy() {
092                enabled = false; // Disable bullet
093                Asteroids.gc.removeBullet(this); // Remove bullet from game controller
094        }
095
096        /** Returns x coordinate of object
097        * @return x coordinate of object
098        */
099        public double x() {
100                return x;
101        }
102
103        /** Returns y coordinate of objecct
104        * @return y coordinate of object
105        */
106        public double y() {
107                return y;
108        }
109
110        /** Returns this objects speed
111        * @return Speed of object
112        */
113        public int getSpeed() {
114                return speed;
115        }
116
117        /** Returns this objects direction
118        * @return Direction of object
119        */
120        public double getDirection() {
121                return direction;
122        }
123
124        /** Returns if object is enabled
125        * @return true if object is enabled
126        */
127        public boolean isEnabled() {
128                return enabled;
129        }
130
131        /** Returns radius of collision mask
132        * @return Radius of collision mask
133        */
134        public double getMaskRadius() {
135                return 1;
136        }
137
138        /** Returns double array representing center of object
139        * @return Center of object as double array
140        */
141        public double[] getCenter() {
142                double[] center = new double[2];
143                center[0] = x;
144                center[1] = y;
145                return center;
146        }
147
148        /** Compares this object to another
149        * @param another Object to be compared
150        * @return true if objects are equal
151        */
152        public boolean equals(Object another) {
153                if (another == null) {return false;}
154                if (another.getClass() != this.getClass()) {return false;}
155                Bullet other = (Bullet) another;
156                return other.x() == x &&
157                           other.y() == y &&
158                           other.getSpeed() == speed &&
159                           other.getDirection() == direction;
160        }
161
162        public String toString() {
163                return "Bullet at (" + (int) x + "," + (int) y + ") traveling at heading " + (int) direction + " at a speed of " + (int) speed;
164        }
165}
